org.nosco
Class Condition

java.lang.Object
  org.nosco.Condition

public abstract class Condition
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a SQL conditional statement. (ie: the contents of the where clause) They are almost always created by Field instances.   For example: SomeClass.ID.eq(123) would be a condition equivalent to "someclass.id=123" in SQL.

Conditions can be built into any arbitrary tree.   For example: SomeClass.ID.eq(123).or(SomeClass.NAME.like("%me%")) would generate "someclass.id=123 or someclass.name like '%me%'"

Author:
Derek Anderson
